origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketAPI.get_merger_feedback', 'description': 'This function provides market feedback and evaluations on similar merger cases based on the industry and transaction type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry sector of the companies involved in the merger.'}, {'name': 'transactionType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of transaction, e.g., acquisition, merger.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'marketFeedback', 'description': 'The market reactions and evaluations on similar merger cases.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketAPI.get_merger_feedback, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'Tech', 'transactionType'是'acquisition'.
